TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "ice", "quantity": 14, "index": 11}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 34, "index": 22}, {"type": "firework_rocket", "quantity": 55, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 35, "index": 34}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a cookie, I need to craft wheat first. I need to place 9 hay_block in the crafting table, and I will start by placing the hay_block in slot 13 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: The wheat is ready, so I will move it from slot 0 to slot 12, to free up the crafting grid for the next step.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 9
